name: Lucky Match
description:
Lucky Match is designed for a sweet and easy puzzle gameplay, straightforward fingertip control, fantastic level design and exciting gaming to bring you the ultimate experience of a faster level progression.

Explore the sweet adventure through Jelly Fruit Land. Travel through the magical lands, visiting various seasons and places to meet awesome candy fruit characters! Match your way through hundreds of fun levels to reach the Jelly Fruit snow land

Play with friends on your social network and compete to get the highest score
-------------------------------
Lucky Match features:
● Collect jelly and fruits to progress along the Track for super sweet surprises!
● More than 100+ levels waiting for you to reach
● Unwrap delicious environments and meet the sweetest characters
● Use bombs to explode jellies and fruits to pass through challenging levels
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● It's easy to sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
● Easy gameplay than ever before

How to Play:
★ Connect three items or more to progress.
★ The longer the connection, the higher the score with surprises
